options.name: --kit <NAME>
options.description: Use the specified Cordova Dev Kit for this project rather than the default.  Use "taco kit list" to see a list of available Kits.

options.name: --template <NAME>
options.description: Use an alternate project template instead of blank.

options.name: --cli <VERSION>
options.description: Use a version of the Cordova CLI rather than a Cordova Dev Kit.

options.name: --copy-from|src <PATH>
options.description: Use custom www assets instead using a template.

options.name: --link-to <PATH>
options.description: Symlink to custom www assets without creating a copy.

prepare.description: Copy files into platform(s) for building

serve.description: Run project with a local webserver (including prepare)
